tool.name: Load Sequences from SeqDB
tool.description: through web services. Produces a fasta file of the specified sequences.
tool.command:
pull_seqdb_seqs -c $config_file $pull_type_cond.pull_type #if $pull_type_cond.pull_type != "its" #if $pull_type_cond.specimen_nums --specNums "$pull_type_cond.specimen_nums" #end if
#if $pull_type_cond.sequence_name --seqName $pull_type_cond.sequence_name #end if
#if $pull_type_cond.sample_name --sampleName $pull_type_cond.sample_name #end if
#if $pull_type_cond.region_name --geneRegion $pull_type_cond.region_name #end if
#if $pull_type_cond.project_name --projectName $pull_type_cond.project_name #end if
#if $pull_type_cond.collection_code --collectionCode $pull_type_cond.collection_code #end if
#if $pull_type_cond.taxon_value --taxRank $pull_type_cond.taxon_rank --taxValue $pull_type_cond.taxon_value #end if
#if $pull_type_cond.output_taxonomy -t #end if #end if

param.name: pull_type
param.label: Select which sequences you would like to load *

option.help: ITS sequences are defined as sequences linked to a region which has ITS region symbols in its name.

param.name: specimen_nums
param.label: Filter on Specimen Identifier(s). Separate multiple by comma.

param.name: taxon_value
param.label: Taxonomic Value (for the Taxonomic Rank above)
